characterList: 態寅演辰晨農濃送鬼魔塊龍

characters.story: See how the heart forms attitude? It shouts "Tigh!" sharply!
The roof takes the shape of sign of the tiger, asking "Yin? 3am-5am?" curiously!
The water stands for to perform, whispering "Yahn" softly like ripples spreading across a pond!
Picture sign of the dragon taking form - it shouts "Chun?" with vivid energy!
"Chun, is it dawn?" The sun and dragon sign questioned morning curiously - daybreak, the morrow!
The strokes unite to show agriculture, asking "Nohng? Farming?" curiously!
See how the water forms concentrated? It asks "Nohng? Thick?" curiously!
"Sohng!" The road commanded to give sharply - see off, send and dispatch for delivery!
Picture ghost taking form - it asks "Gway" with vivid energy!
The strokes unite to show demon, asking "Mwo? Devil?" curiously!
A striking symbol for lump that shouts "Kwigh!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
A striking symbol for dragon that asks "Lohng? Imperial?" curiously!
